activities.message:
Dear Paulos_,

Thanks for your detailed and well researched report. We're going to study this carefully and will get back to you with our findings shortly.

On behalf of the Revive Adserver team, Erik Geurts
Thanks for the report. The issue is confirmed. As Erik wrote, we'll get back to you shortly.

Hi @erikgeurts @mbeccati ,

Thank you. I appreciate the quick response, please let me know if I can be of any help. :)
Hello, I was wondering if you have an update or ETA on this
Hi paulos_, sure. Here's the patch for you to test. We're still discussing a release date, but a potential candidate is currently Tue 21st.
Thanks again. The release of 4.2.1 is scheduled for tomorrow.

@mbeccati I wanted to say thanks for the nice feedback and also wanted to add `random_bytes()` is a PHP 7 function and if you have backwards compatibility in your application that might cause problems. :)
Thank you. 4.2.x is PHP7+ only, so no problem with that.
